- **Runtime and GC optimizations** by [KC Sivaramakrishnan](https://github.com/kayceesrk) addressing finalizer processing and minor heap management ([ocaml/ocaml#14145](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14145), [ocaml/ocaml#14158](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14158), [ocaml/ocaml#14157](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14157))
- **Module system developments** by [Samuel Vivien](https://github.com/samsa1) progressing modular explicits implementation with transparent ascription and first-class module support ([ocaml/ocaml#14148](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14148), [ocaml/ocaml#14149](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14149), [ocaml/ocaml#14150](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14150))

- **No activity recorded** in ocaml/RFCs repository during this period
group_summaries.key_projects:
- **Modular explicits implementation** advancing through multiple merged PRs by [Samuel Vivien](https://github.com/samsa1) establishing infrastructure for first-class module handling and transparent ascription ([ocaml/ocaml#14148](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14148), [ocaml/ocaml#14149](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14149), [ocaml/ocaml#14150](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14150), [ocaml/ocaml#14064](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14064))
- **OCaml 5 runtime stability** improvements with [KC Sivaramakrishnan](https://github.com/kayceesrk) focusing on multicore-specific GC and memory management issues
- **Type system error message improvements** making complex type errors more understandable, particularly for GADTs and row types
- **Manual documentation for modular explicits** by [Gabriel Scherer](https://github.com/gasche) providing comprehensive examples and usage patterns ([ocaml/ocaml#14048](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14048))
group_summaries.priority_items:
- **OCaml 5 GC performance degradation** reported by [Nat Mote](https://github.com/nmote) requiring space_overhead tuning to achieve OCaml 4 parity, with potential solutions being explored in flambda-backend ([ocaml/ocaml#13868](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/13868))

- **Virtual memory reservation issues** for large minor heaps in OCaml 5 affecting applications like Rocq, with [KC Sivaramakrishnan](https://github.com/kayceesrk) proposing dynamic reservation scaling ([ocaml/ocaml#14153](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14153))
group_summaries.emerging_trends:

- **Advanced language features preparation** with modular explicits and transparent ascription groundwork being established for future language enhancements
- **Developer experience improvements** including better debugging support, installation optimizations, and more comprehensible type error messages
